dmodservices.confirmRandomDModHidden: "After you receive back your now-damaged ship, your double-check your received compensation, only to realize it's slightly higher than expected. Perhaps the D-MOD center wanted to thank you for providing this opportunity to them?"
dmodservices.pickDModDesc: The selected ship can receive the following D-Mods:
dmodservices.confirmDModRandom: Confirm? The selected ship will receive a random D-Mod.
dmodservices.confirmDModPrecise: Confirm? The selected ship will receive
dmodservices.confirmAutomate: Confirm? The selected will become fully-automated and receive a random D-Mod. In addition, it will no longer be possible to restore the ship back to pristine condition.
